summary.span: 命名空間包含類別、介面和列舉，可使用運算式樹狀結構格式將這些語言層級程式碼運算式表示為物件。

span.span: The namespace contains classes, interfaces and enumerations that enable language-level code expressions to be represented as objects in the form of expression trees.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象類別提供用於模型的運算式樹狀架構的類別階層架構的根目錄。The abstract class provides the root of a class hierarchy used to model expression trees. 衍生自這個命名空間中的類別，例如和，用來代表運算式樹狀結構中的節點。The classes in this namespace that derive from , for example and , are used to represent nodes in an expression tree. 類別包含`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) factory 方法，來建立運算式樹狀架構節點的各種類型。The class contains `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) factory methods to create expression tree nodes of the various types. 列舉型別指定唯一的節點類型。The enumeration type specifies the unique node types.
